**Setup:** Plume Veil RDA; dual parallel @ .35Î©; cotton wicks; 45W

**Testing:** FA Pear @ 3%; Aged: 3 days

**Flavor description:**  Juicy, bright, crisp, sweet, authentic pear taste.  Very refreshing.  Not tart or bitter.  Leaves a lingering sweetness on the tongue.

**Off-flavors:**  None

**Throat hit:** 2/10 very smooth 

**Uses:**  Great mid or top note, I have also heard of this used in place of sweetener or as an accent to tropical fruits or strawberry at lower percentages. 

**Pairings:** Use with a small amount of TFA Pear to provide earthiness and create a well-rounded pear flavor.  Also works well with almost any fruits in a mix.  Holds up well with creams as well.

**Notes:**   If you're after an authentic pear flavor, this is a must have.
